        Returns:

      • updateCoupledOrderIdOp

        void updateCoupledOrderIdOp(int employeeId,
                            int orderId,
                            int productId)
        This method updates the coupled dish to the employee
        Parameters:
        employeeId - The employee that have to make the dish.
        orderId - The order Id of the order.
        productId - The product id that is in the order.
